columns.Model_name: The unique identifier for each chip model.
columns.Launch_year: The year the chip model was released.
columns.RAM_MiB: The RAM capacity of the chip model in MiB.
columns.ROM_MiB: The ROM capacity of the chip model in MiB.
columns.Slots: The types of slots available on the chip model.
columns.WiFi: The WiFi standards supported by the chip model.
columns.Bluetooth: The Bluetooth version supported by the chip model.

chip_model.table_description: The table provides details of various chip models.

columns.Company_name: The name of the company manufacturing the hardware model.
columns.Hardware_Model_name: The unique identifier for each hardware model.
columns.Accreditation_type: The type of accreditation granted to the hardware model.
columns.Accreditation_level: The level of accreditation assigned to the hardware model.
columns.Date: The date when the accreditation was awarded or approved.
columns.chip_model: The specific chip model associated with the hardware model.
columns.screen_mode: The graphics mode supported by the hardware model.

phone.table_description: The table contains details about various phone hardware models.

columns.Graphics_mode: The unique identifier for each graphics mode.
columns.Char_cells: The dimensions of character cells in the graphics mode.
columns.Pixels: The pixel dimensions supported by the graphics mode.
columns.Hardware_colours: The number of colors displayed by the graphics mode.
columns.used_kb: The memory usage in kilobytes for the graphics mode.
columns.map: The memory range associated with the graphics mode.
columns.Type: The classification of the graphics mode as graphics or text.

screen_mode.table_description: The table details different graphics modes and their characteristics.
